    });
}

function initializeContactForm() {
    const form = select("#contact-form");
    const inputName = select("#input-name");
    const inputEmail = select("#input-email");
    const inputMessage = select("#input-message");
    const counter = select("#message-counter");
    const status = select("#form-status");
    
    // Character counter
    const updateCounter = () => {
        const len = inputMessage.value.length;
        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
	inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
	updateCounter();
    
    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
		e.preventDefault();
		status.textContent = "";
        
        const errors = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.push("ÂßìÂêçËá≥Â∞ëÈúÄË¶Å 2 ÂÄãÂ≠óÂÖÉ");
        }
        
        if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(inputEmail.value)) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈõªÂ≠êÈÉµ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ");
        }
        
        if (inputMessage.value.trim().length === 0) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•Ë®äÊÅØÂÖßÂÆπ");
        }
        
		if (errors.length > 0) {
            status.textContent = "Ë°®ÂñÆÈ©óË≠âÂ§±ÊïóÔºö" + errors.join("„ÄÅ");
            status.style.color = "var(--accent-color)";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)";
            status.style.padding = "10px";
            status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
			return;
		}
        
        // Simulate form submission
        status.textContent = "Ë®äÊÅØÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÈÄÅÂá∫ÔºÅÊÑüË¨ùÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰æÜ‰ø°ÔºåÊàëÊúÉÁõ°Âø´ÂõûË¶Ü„ÄÇ";
        status.style.color = "var(--secondary-color)";
        status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.1)";
        status.style.padding = "10px";
        status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
        
        // Reset form
		form.reset();
		updateCounter();
        
        // Clear status after 5 seconds
        setTimeout(() => {
            status.textContent = "";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "";
        }, 5000);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {

    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {

        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="some_picture/${categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel'}/${photo}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = option.dataset.theme;
            applyTheme(theme);
            dropdown.classList.remove("show");
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

```javascript
// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

};

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;

    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {

        item.className = "gallery-item";

        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="some_picture/${categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel'}/${photo}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = option.dataset.theme;
            applyTheme(theme);
            dropdown.classList.remove("show");
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);

    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];

        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' :

        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({

            category: categoryName
        });

                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = option.dataset.theme;
            applyTheme(theme);
            dropdown.classList.remove("show");
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

function initializePrintFunction() {

    printBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        window.print();
    });
}

function initializeContactForm() {

    const inputName = select("#input-name");

    const counter = select("#message-counter");
    const status = select("#form-status");

    const updateCounter = () => {

        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
	inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
	updateCounter();
    
    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
		e.preventDefault();
		status.textContent = "";
        
        const errors = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

function populateGallery(galleryId: string, photos: string[], categoryName: string): void {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', String(index));
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select<HTMLDivElement>("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName: string) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames: { [key: string]: string } = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = (option as HTMLElement).dataset.theme;
            if (theme) {
                applyTheme(theme);
                dropdown.classList.remove("show");
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

function initializePrintFunction(): void {
    const printBtn = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#print-cv");
    
    printBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        window.print();
    });
}

function initializeContactForm(): void {
    const form = select<HTMLFormElement>("#contact-form");
    const inputName = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-name");
    const inputEmail = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-email");
    const inputMessage = select<HTMLTextAreaElement>("#input-message");
    const counter = select<HTMLElement>("#message-counter");
    const status = select<HTMLElement>("#form-status");

    // Character counter
    const updateCounter = () => {
        const len = inputMessage.value.length;
        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
    inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
    updateCounter();

    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        status.textContent = "";

        const errors: string[] = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.push("ÂßìÂêçËá≥Â∞ëÈúÄË¶Å 2 ÂÄãÂ≠óÂÖÉ");
        }
        
        if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(inputEmail.value)) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈõªÂ≠êÈÉµ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ");
        }
        
        if (inputMessage.value.trim().length === 0) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•Ë®äÊÅØÂÖßÂÆπ");
        }

        if (errors.length > 0) {
            status.textContent = "Ë°®ÂñÆÈ©óË≠âÂ§±ÊïóÔºö" + errors.join("„ÄÅ");
            status.style.color = "var(--accent-color)";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)";
            status.style.padding = "10px";
            status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
            return;
        }

        // Simulate form submission
        status.textContent = "Ë®äÊÅØÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÈÄÅÂá∫ÔºÅÊÑüË¨ùÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰æÜ‰ø°ÔºåÊàëÊúÉÁõ°Âø´ÂõûË¶Ü„ÄÇ";
        status.style.color = "var(--secondary-color)";
        status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.1)";
        status.style.padding = "10px";
        status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
        
        // Reset form
        form.reset();
        updateCounter();
        
        // Clear status after 5 seconds
        setTimeout(() => {
            status.textContent = "";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "";
        }, 5000);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling(): void {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

// Export for potential module usage
export { cvData, initializeCV };

// Main Application
function initializeCV(): void {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select<HTMLSpanElement>("#year");
    yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());

    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo(): void {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
    if (!nameEl.textContent?.trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select<HTMLElement>("#email");
    if (!emailEl.textContent?.trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select<HTMLElement>("#phone");
    if (!phoneEl.textContent?.trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select<HTMLElement>("#location");
    if (!locationEl.textContent?.trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select<HTMLAnchorElement>("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select<HTMLImageElement>("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
    }
}

function populateExperience(): void {

function populateGallery(galleryId: string, photos: string[], categoryName: string): void {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', String(index));
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select<HTMLDivElement>("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName: string) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames: { [key: string]: string } = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = (option as HTMLElement).dataset.theme;
            if (theme) {
                applyTheme(theme);
                dropdown.classList.remove("show");
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

function initializePrintFunction(): void {
    const printBtn = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#print-cv");
    
    printBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        window.print();
    });
}

function initializeContactForm(): void {
    const form = select<HTMLFormElement>("#contact-form");
    const inputName = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-name");
    const inputEmail = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-email");
    const inputMessage = select<HTMLTextAreaElement>("#input-message");
    const counter = select<HTMLElement>("#message-counter");
    const status = select<HTMLElement>("#form-status");

    // Character counter
    const updateCounter = () => {
        const len = inputMessage.value.length;
        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
    inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
    updateCounter();

    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        status.textContent = "";

        const errors: string[] = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.push("ÂßìÂêçËá≥Â∞ëÈúÄË¶Å 2 ÂÄãÂ≠óÂÖÉ");
        }
        
        if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(inputEmail.value)) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈõªÂ≠êÈÉµ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ");
        }
        
        if (inputMessage.value.trim().length === 0) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•Ë®äÊÅØÂÖßÂÆπ");
        }

        if (errors.length > 0) {
            status.textContent = "Ë°®ÂñÆÈ©óË≠âÂ§±ÊïóÔºö" + errors.join("„ÄÅ");
            status.style.color = "var(--accent-color)";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)";
            status.style.padding = "10px";
            status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
            return;
        }

        // Simulate form submission
        status.textContent = "Ë®äÊÅØÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÈÄÅÂá∫ÔºÅÊÑüË¨ùÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰æÜ‰ø°ÔºåÊàëÊúÉÁõ°Âø´ÂõûË¶Ü„ÄÇ";
        status.style.color = "var(--secondary-color)";
        status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.1)";
        status.style.padding = "10px";
        status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
        
        // Reset form
        form.reset();
        updateCounter();
        
        // Clear status after 5 seconds
        setTimeout(() => {
            status.textContent = "";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "";
        }, 5000);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling(): void {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

// Export for potential module usage
export { cvData, initializeCV };

function initializeCV(): void {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select<HTMLSpanElement>("#year");
    yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());

    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo(): void {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
    if (!nameEl.textContent?.trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select<HTMLElement>("#email");
    if (!emailEl.textContent?.trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select<HTMLElement>("#phone");
    if (!phoneEl.textContent?.trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select<HTMLElement>("#location");
    if (!locationEl.textContent?.trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select<HTMLAnchorElement>("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select<HTMLImageElement>("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
    }
}

function populateExperience(): void {

    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {

        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>

        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);

    container.appendChild(fragment);

function populateGallery(galleryId: string, photos: string[], categoryName: string): void {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}> = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', String(index));
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            (window as any).openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        (item as HTMLElement).style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select<HTMLDivElement>("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName: string) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames: { [key: string]: string } = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = (option as HTMLElement).dataset.theme;
            if (theme) {
                applyTheme(theme);
                dropdown.classList.remove("show");
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

function initializePrintFunction(): void {
    const printBtn = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#print-cv");
    
    printBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        window.print();
    });
}

function initializeContactForm(): void {
    const form = select<HTMLFormElement>("#contact-form");
    const inputName = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-name");
    const inputEmail = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-email");
    const inputMessage = select<HTMLTextAreaElement>("#input-message");
    const counter = select<HTMLElement>("#message-counter");
    const status = select<HTMLElement>("#form-status");

    // Character counter
    const updateCounter = () => {
        const len = inputMessage.value.length;
        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
    inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
    updateCounter();

    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        status.textContent = "";

        const errors: string[] = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.push("ÂßìÂêçËá≥Â∞ëÈúÄË¶Å 2 ÂÄãÂ≠óÂÖÉ");
        }
        
        if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(inputEmail.value)) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈõªÂ≠êÈÉµ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ");
        }
        
        if (inputMessage.value.trim().length === 0) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•Ë®äÊÅØÂÖßÂÆπ");
        }

        if (errors.length > 0) {
            status.textContent = "Ë°®ÂñÆÈ©óË≠âÂ§±ÊïóÔºö" + errors.join("„ÄÅ");
            status.style.color = "var(--accent-color)";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)";
            status.style.padding = "10px";
            status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
            return;
        }

        // Simulate form submission
        status.textContent = "Ë®äÊÅØÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÈÄÅÂá∫ÔºÅÊÑüË¨ùÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰æÜ‰ø°ÔºåÊàëÊúÉÁõ°Âø´ÂõûË¶Ü„ÄÇ";
        status.style.color = "var(--secondary-color)";
        status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.1)";
        status.style.padding = "10px";
        status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
        
        // Reset form
        form.reset();
        updateCounter();
        
        // Clear status after 5 seconds
        setTimeout(() => {
            status.textContent = "";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "";
        }, 5000);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling(): void {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

// Export for potential module usage
export { cvData, initializeCV };

// Main Application
function initializeCV(): void {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select<HTMLSpanElement>("#year");
    yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());

    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo(): void {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
    if (!nameEl.textContent?.trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select<HTMLElement>("#email");
    if (!emailEl.textContent?.trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select<HTMLElement>("#phone");
    if (!phoneEl.textContent?.trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select<HTMLElement>("#location");
    if (!locationEl.textContent?.trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select<HTMLAnchorElement>("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select<HTMLImageElement>("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
    }
}

function populateExperience(): void {
    const container = select<HTMLElement>("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

    cvData.education.forEach(edu => {

function populateGallery(galleryId: string, photos: string[], categoryName: string): void {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}> = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', String(index));
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            (window as any).openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        (item as HTMLElement).style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeThemeToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#theme-toggle");
    const dropdown = select<HTMLDivElement>("#theme-dropdown");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (themeName: string) => {
        // Remove all theme classes
        document.body.classList.remove("theme-dark", "theme-blue", "theme-green", "theme-purple", "theme-orange");
        
        // Add the selected theme class
        if (themeName !== "light") {
            document.body.classList.add(`theme-${themeName}`);
        }
        
        // Update button text
        const themeNames: { [key: string]: string } = {
            light: "Ê∑∫Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            dark: "Ê∑±Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å", 
            blue: "ËóçËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            green: "Á∂†Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            purple: "Á¥´Ëâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å",
            orange: "Ê©ôËâ≤‰∏ªÈ°å"
        };
        toggle.textContent = `üé® ${themeNames[themeName]}`;
        
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, themeName);
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) || "light";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    // Toggle dropdown
    toggle.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation();
        dropdown.classList.toggle("show");
    });
    
    // Theme selection
    dropdown.querySelectorAll(".theme-option").forEach(option => {
        option.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const theme = (option as HTMLElement).dataset.theme;
            if (theme) {
                applyTheme(theme);
                dropdown.classList.remove("show");
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Close dropdown when clicking outside
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        dropdown.classList.remove("show");
    });
}

function initializeContactForm(): void {
    const form = select<HTMLFormElement>("#contact-form");
    const inputName = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-name");
    const inputEmail = select<HTMLInputElement>("#input-email");
    const inputMessage = select<HTMLTextAreaElement>("#input-message");
    const counter = select<HTMLElement>("#message-counter");
    const status = select<HTMLElement>("#form-status");

    // Character counter
    const updateCounter = () => {
        const len = inputMessage.value.length;
        counter.textContent = `${len} / ${inputMessage.maxLength}`;
    };
    
    inputMessage.addEventListener("input", updateCounter);
    updateCounter();

    // Form validation and submission
    form.addEventListener("submit", (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        status.textContent = "";

        const errors: string[] = [];
        
        if (inputName.value.trim().length < 2) {
            errors.push("ÂßìÂêçËá≥Â∞ëÈúÄË¶Å 2 ÂÄãÂ≠óÂÖÉ");
        }
        
        if (!/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(inputEmail.value)) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈõªÂ≠êÈÉµ‰ª∂Âú∞ÂùÄ");
        }
        
        if (inputMessage.value.trim().length === 0) {
            errors.push("Ë´ãËº∏ÂÖ•Ë®äÊÅØÂÖßÂÆπ");
        }

        if (errors.length > 0) {
            status.textContent = "Ë°®ÂñÆÈ©óË≠âÂ§±ÊïóÔºö" + errors.join("„ÄÅ");
            status.style.color = "var(--accent-color)";
            status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(231, 76, 60, 0.1)";
            status.style.padding = "10px";
            status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
            return;
        }

        // Simulate form submission
        status.textContent = "Ë®äÊÅØÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÈÄÅÂá∫ÔºÅÊÑüË¨ùÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰æÜ‰ø°ÔºåÊàëÊúÉÁõ°Âø´ÂõûË¶Ü„ÄÇ";
        status.style.color = "var(--secondary-color)";
        status.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.1)";
        status.style.padding = "10px";
        status.style.borderRadius = "var(--border-radius)";
        
        // Reset form
        form.reset();
        updateCounter();
        
        // Clear status after 5 seconds

    });

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling(): void {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex: number = 0;
let currentPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}> = [];

function initializePhotoModal(): void {
    const modal = select<HTMLDivElement>("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select<HTMLImageElement>("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select<HTMLDivElement>("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal(): void {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction: number): void {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData: {src: string, alt: string, category: string}): void {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    (window as any).openPhotoModal = (photoSrc: string, category: string, allPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}>) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

// Export for potential module usage
export { cvData, initializeCV };
