// Utility Functions
const select = (selector) => {
    const el = document.querySelector(selector);
    if (!el) throw new Error(`Element not found: ${selector}`);
    return el;
};

const formatYear = (d) => String(d.getFullYear());

// Main Application
function initializeCV() {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select("#year");
	yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());
    
    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo() {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select("#name");
    if (!(nameEl.textContent || '').trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select("#email");
    if (!(emailEl.textContent || '').trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select("#phone");
    if (!(phoneEl.textContent || '').trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select("#location");
    if (!(locationEl.textContent || '').trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            window.openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience() {
    const container = select("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeLanguageToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#language-toggle");
    const languageKey = "cv-language";
    
    const applyLanguage = (isEnglish) => {
        if (isEnglish) {
            // Switch to English
            toggle.textContent = "üåê English";
            document.documentElement.lang = "en";
            
            // Update key elements to English
            const nameEl = select("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Hong-Rui Chang";
            }
            
            const titleEl = document.querySelector(".title");
            if (titleEl) {
                titleEl.textContent = "Electrical Engineering Student | EDA & Digital Design Specialist";
            }
            
            const summaryEl = document.querySelector(".summary");
            if (summaryEl) {
                summaryEl.textContent = "Currently specializing in EDA tool development and digital circuit design, with some FPGA development experience. Recently focused on researching SAT problem knowledge and techniques.";
            }
            
            // Update section titles
            updateSectionTitles(true);
            
            // Update contact information
            updateContactInfo(true);
            
            // Update footer
            updateFooter(true);
        } else {
            // Switch to Chinese
            toggle.textContent = "üåê ‰∏≠Êñá";
            document.documentElement.lang = "zh-Hant";
            
            // Update key elements to Chinese
            const nameEl = select("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Hong-Rui Chang") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû";
            }
            
            const titleEl = document.querySelector(".title");
            if (titleEl) {
                titleEl.textContent = "ÈõªÊ©üÂ∑•Á®ãÂ≠∏Á≥ªÂ≠∏Áîü | EDA ËàáÊï∏‰ΩçË®≠Ë®àÂ∞àÈï∑";
            }
            
            const summaryEl = document.querySelector(".summary");
            if (summaryEl) {
                summaryEl.textContent = "ÁõÆÂâçÂ∞àÁ≤æÊñº EDA Â∑•ÂÖ∑ÈñãÁôºËàáÊï∏‰ΩçÈõªË∑ØË®≠Ë®àÔºåÂÖ∑ÂÇô‰∫õË®±FPGAÁöÑÈñãÁôºÁ∂ìÈ©óÔºåËøëÊúüËá¥ÂäõÊñºÁ†îÁ©∂SATÂïèÈ°åÊñπÈù¢ÁöÑÁü•Ë≠òËàáÊäÄË°ì„ÄÇ";
            }
            
            // Update section titles
            updateSectionTitles(false);
            
            // Update contact information
            updateContactInfo(false);
            
            // Update footer
            updateFooter(false);
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(languageKey, String(isEnglish));
    };
    
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem(languageKey) === "true";
    applyLanguage(savedLanguage);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyEnglish = toggle.textContent.includes("English");
        applyLanguage(!isCurrentlyEnglish);
    });
}

        gallery: isEnglish ? "üì∏ Life Gallery" : "üì∏ ÁîüÊ¥ªÂâ™ÂΩ±"

    Object.keys(sectionTitles).forEach(sectionId => {

        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#theme-toggle");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (isDark) => {
        document.body.classList.toggle("theme-dark", isDark);
        toggle.setAttribute("aria-pressed", String(isDark));
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, String(isDark));
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) === "true";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyDark = document.body.classList.contains("theme-dark");
        applyTheme(!isCurrentlyDark);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeBackgroundToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#background-toggle");
    const backgroundKey = "cv-background";
    
    const backgrounds = [
        "bg-gradient-1", "bg-gradient-2", "bg-gradient-3", "bg-gradient-4",
        "bg-gradient-5", "bg-gradient-6", "bg-gradient-7", "bg-gradient-8"
    ];
    
    const backgroundNames = [
        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

// Utility Functions
const select = (selector) => {
    const el = document.querySelector(selector);
    if (!el) throw new Error(`Element not found: ${selector}`);
    return el;
};

const formatYear = (d) => String(d.getFullYear());

// Main Application
function initializeCV() {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select("#year");
	yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());
    
    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo() {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select("#name");
    if (!(nameEl.textContent || '').trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select("#email");
    if (!(emailEl.textContent || '').trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select("#phone");
    if (!(phoneEl.textContent || '').trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select("#location");
    if (!(locationEl.textContent || '').trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            window.openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience() {
    const container = select("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeLanguageToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#language-toggle");
    const languageKey = "cv-language";
    
    const applyLanguage = (isEnglish) => {
        if (isEnglish) {
            // Switch to English
            toggle.textContent = "üåê English";
            document.documentElement.lang = "en";
            
            // Update key elements to English
            const nameEl = select("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Hong-Rui Chang";
            }
            
            const titleEl = document.querySelector(".title");
            if (titleEl) {
                titleEl.textContent = "Electrical Engineering Student | EDA & Digital Design Specialist";
            }
            
            const summaryEl = document.querySelector(".summary");
            if (summaryEl) {
                summaryEl.textContent = "Currently specializing in EDA tool development and digital circuit design, with some FPGA development experience. Recently focused on researching SAT problem knowledge and techniques.";
            }
            
            // Update section titles
            updateSectionTitles(true);
            
            // Update contact information
            updateContactInfo(true);
            
            // Update footer
            updateFooter(true);
        } else {
            // Switch to Chinese
            toggle.textContent = "üåê ‰∏≠Êñá";
            document.documentElement.lang = "zh-Hant";
            
            // Update key elements to Chinese
            const nameEl = select("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Hong-Rui Chang") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû";
            }
            
            const titleEl = document.querySelector(".title");
            if (titleEl) {
                titleEl.textContent = "ÈõªÊ©üÂ∑•Á®ãÂ≠∏Á≥ªÂ≠∏Áîü | EDA ËàáÊï∏‰ΩçË®≠Ë®àÂ∞àÈï∑";
            }
            
            const summaryEl = document.querySelector(".summary");
            if (summaryEl) {
                summaryEl.textContent = "ÁõÆÂâçÂ∞àÁ≤æÊñº EDA Â∑•ÂÖ∑ÈñãÁôºËàáÊï∏‰ΩçÈõªË∑ØË®≠Ë®àÔºåÂÖ∑ÂÇô‰∫õË®±FPGAÁöÑÈñãÁôºÁ∂ìÈ©óÔºåËøëÊúüËá¥ÂäõÊñºÁ†îÁ©∂SATÂïèÈ°åÊñπÈù¢ÁöÑÁü•Ë≠òËàáÊäÄË°ì„ÄÇ";
            }
            
            // Update section titles
            updateSectionTitles(false);
            
            // Update contact information
            updateContactInfo(false);
            
            // Update footer
            updateFooter(false);
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(languageKey, String(isEnglish));
    };
    
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem(languageKey) === "true";
    applyLanguage(savedLanguage);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyEnglish = toggle.textContent.includes("English");
        applyLanguage(!isCurrentlyEnglish);
    });
}

        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

const select = (selector) => {

};

const formatYear = (d) => String(d.getFullYear());

// Main Application

function populatePersonalInfo() {
    const { personal } = cvData;

    const nameEl = select("#name");
    if (!(nameEl.textContent || '').trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select("#email");
    if (!(emailEl.textContent || '').trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select("#phone");
    if (!(phoneEl.textContent || '').trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select("#location");
    if (!(locationEl.textContent || '').trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,

            window.openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

    const container = select("#experience-list");

    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");

            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>

            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>

                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeBackgroundToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#background-toggle");
    const backgroundKey = "cv-background";
    
    const backgrounds = [
        "bg-gradient-1", "bg-gradient-2", "bg-gradient-3", "bg-gradient-4",
        "bg-gradient-5", "bg-gradient-6", "bg-gradient-7", "bg-gradient-8"
    ];
    
    const backgroundNames = [
        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

// Utility Functions
const select = (selector) => {
    const el = document.querySelector(selector);
    if (!el) throw new Error(`Element not found: ${selector}`);
    return el;
};

const formatYear = (d) => String(d.getFullYear());

// Main Application
function initializeCV() {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select("#year");
	yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());
    
    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo() {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select("#name");
    if (!(nameEl.textContent || '').trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select("#email");
    if (!(emailEl.textContent || '').trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select("#phone");
    if (!(phoneEl.textContent || '').trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select("#location");
    if (!(locationEl.textContent || '').trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            window.openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience() {
    const container = select("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeLanguageToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#language-toggle");
    const languageKey = "cv-language";
    
    const applyLanguage = (isEnglish) => {
        if (isEnglish) {
            // Switch to English
            toggle.textContent = "üåê English";
            document.documentElement.lang = "en";
            
            // Update all content to English
            updateAllContent(true);
        } else {
            // Switch to Chinese
            toggle.textContent = "üåê ‰∏≠Êñá";
            document.documentElement.lang = "zh-Hant";
            
            // Update all content to Chinese
            updateAllContent(false);
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(languageKey, String(isEnglish));
    };
    
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem(languageKey) === "true";
    applyLanguage(savedLanguage);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyEnglish = toggle.textContent.includes("English");
        applyLanguage(!isCurrentlyEnglish);
    });
}

function initializeBackgroundToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#background-toggle");
    const backgroundKey = "cv-background";
    
    const backgrounds = [
        "bg-gradient-1", "bg-gradient-2", "bg-gradient-3", "bg-gradient-4",
        "bg-gradient-5", "bg-gradient-6", "bg-gradient-7", "bg-gradient-8"
    ];
    
    const backgroundNames = [
        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#theme-toggle");
    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (isDark) => {
        document.body.classList.toggle("theme-dark", isDark);
        toggle.setAttribute("aria-pressed", String(isDark));
        localStorage.setItem(themeKey, String(isDark));
    };
    
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(themeKey) === "true";
    applyTheme(savedTheme);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyDark = document.body.classList.contains("theme-dark");
        applyTheme(!isCurrentlyDark);
    });
}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

// Utility Functions
const select = (selector) => {
    const el = document.querySelector(selector);
    if (!el) throw new Error(`Element not found: ${selector}`);
    return el;
};

const formatYear = (d) => String(d.getFullYear());

// Main Application
function initializeCV() {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select("#year");
	yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());
    
    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializePrintFunction();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo() {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select("#name");
    if (!(nameEl.textContent || '').trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select("#email");
    if (!(emailEl.textContent || '').trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select("#phone");
    if (!(phoneEl.textContent || '').trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select("#location");
    if (!(locationEl.textContent || '').trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            window.openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience() {
    const container = select("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId, photos, categoryName) {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', index);
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèã&ÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            window.openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        item.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeLanguageToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#language-toggle");
    const languageKey = "cv-language";
    
    const applyLanguage = (isEnglish) => {
        if (isEnglish) {
            // Switch to English
            toggle.textContent = "üåê English";
            document.documentElement.lang = "en";
            
            // Update all content to English
            updateAllContent(true);
        } else {
            // Switch to Chinese
            toggle.textContent = "üåê ‰∏≠Êñá";
            document.documentElement.lang = "zh-Hant";
            
            // Update all content to Chinese
            updateAllContent(false);
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(languageKey, String(isEnglish));
    };
    
    const savedLanguage = localStorage.getItem(languageKey) === "true";
    applyLanguage(savedLanguage);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const isCurrentlyEnglish = toggle.textContent.includes("English");
        applyLanguage(!isCurrentlyEnglish);
    });
}

function initializeBackgroundToggle() {
    const toggle = select("#background-toggle");
    const backgroundKey = "cv-background";
    
    const backgrounds = [
        "bg-gradient-1", "bg-gradient-2", "bg-gradient-3", "bg-gradient-4",
        "bg-gradient-5", "bg-gradient-6", "bg-gradient-7", "bg-gradient-8"
    ];
    
    const backgroundNames = [
        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey)) || -1;
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

function initializeThemeToggle() {

    const themeKey = "cv-theme";
    
    const applyTheme = (isDark) => {
        document.body.classList.toggle("theme-dark", isDark);
        toggle.setAttribute("aria-pressed", String(isDark));

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling() {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
		e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
	});
		}
        });
	});
}

// Scroll-triggered animations
function initializeScrollAnimations() {
    const observerOptions = {
        threshold: 0.1,
        rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
    };

    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.style.animationPlayState = 'running';
                entry.target.classList.add('animate-in');
            }
        });
    }, observerOptions);

    // Observe all sections and timeline items
    document.querySelectorAll('.cv-section, .timeline-item, .project-item').forEach((el, index) => {
        el.style.animationPlayState = 'paused';
        el.style.setProperty('--section-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--item-delay', index);
        el.style.setProperty('--project-delay', index);
        observer.observe(el);
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex = 0;
let currentPhotos = [];

function initializePhotoModal() {
    const modal = select("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal() {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction) {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData) {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    window.openPhotoModal = (photoSrc, category, allPhotos) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
    initializeScrollAnimations();
});

// Main Application
function initializeCV(): void {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select<HTMLSpanElement>("#year");
    yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());

    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateDiverseCases();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo(): void {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
    if (!nameEl.textContent?.trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select<HTMLElement>("#email");
    if (!emailEl.textContent?.trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select<HTMLElement>("#phone");
    if (!phoneEl.textContent?.trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select<HTMLElement>("#location");
    if (!locationEl.textContent?.trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select<HTMLAnchorElement>("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select<HTMLImageElement>("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            (window as any).openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience(): void {
    const container = select<HTMLElement>("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateGallery(galleryId: string, photos: string[], categoryName: string): void {
    const container = document.getElementById(galleryId);
    if (!container) return;
    
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    // Prepare all photos for modal
    const allPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}> = [];
    
    photos.forEach((photo, index) => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "gallery-item";
        item.style.setProperty('--gallery-delay', String(index));
        
        const folderName = categoryName === 'ÊúãÂèãÁîüÊ¥ª' ? 'Friends life' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁôªÂ±±ÂÅ•Ë°å' ? 'mountain' : 
                          categoryName === 'ÁæéÈ£üÂ∞àÂçÄ' ? 'Food' : 'Travel';
        
        const photoSrc = `some_picture/${folderName}/${photo}`;
        
        // Add to all photos array
        allPhotos.push({
            src: photoSrc,
            alt: categoryName,
            category: categoryName
        });
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <img src="${photoSrc}" 
                 alt="${categoryName}" class="gallery-photo" 
                 onerror="this.style.display='none'">
            <div class="gallery-overlay">
                <span>${categoryName}</span>
            </div>
        `;
        
        // Add click event
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
            (window as any).openPhotoModal(photoSrc, categoryName, allPhotos);
        });
        
        // Add cursor pointer style
        (item as HTMLElement).style.cursor = 'pointer';
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function initializeLanguageToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#language-toggle");
    const languageKey = "cv-language";
    
    const applyLanguage = (isEnglish: boolean) => {
        if (isEnglish) {
            // Switch to English
            toggle.textContent = "üåê English";
            document.documentElement.lang = "en";
            
            // Update key elements to English
            const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Hong-Rui Chang";
            }
            
            const titleEl = document.querySelector(".title");
            if (titleEl) {
                titleEl.textContent = "Electrical Engineering Student | EDA & Digital Design Specialist";
            }
            
            const summaryEl = document.querySelector(".summary");
            if (summaryEl) {
                summaryEl.textContent = "Currently specializing in EDA tool development and digital circuit design, with some FPGA development experience. Recently focused on researching SAT problem knowledge and techniques.";
            }
            
            // Update section titles
            updateSectionTitles(true);
        } else {
            // Switch to Chinese
            toggle.textContent = "üåê ‰∏≠Êñá";
            document.documentElement.lang = "zh-Hant";
            
            // Update key elements to Chinese
            const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
            if (nameEl.textContent === "Hong-Rui Chang") {
                nameEl.textContent = "Á´†ÂÆèÁëû";
            }

function initializeBackgroundToggle(): void {
    const toggle = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#background-toggle");
    const backgroundKey = "cv-background";
    
    const backgrounds = [
        "bg-gradient-1", "bg-gradient-2", "bg-gradient-3", "bg-gradient-4",
        "bg-gradient-5", "bg-gradient-6", "bg-gradient-7", "bg-gradient-8"
    ];
    
    const backgroundNames = [
        "Á¥´ËóçÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥ÖÊº∏Â±§", "ËóçËâ≤Êº∏Â±§", "Á∂†Ëâ≤Êº∏Â±§",
        "Á≤âÈªÉÊº∏Â±§", "ÈùíÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§", "Á≤âÁ¥´Êº∏Â±§", "Ê©ôÁ≤âÊº∏Â±§"
    ];
    
    let currentIndex = 0;
    
    const applyBackground = (index: number) => {
        // Remove all background classes
        document.body.classList.remove(...backgrounds);
        
        // Add the selected background
        if (index >= 0 && index < backgrounds.length) {
            document.body.classList.add(backgrounds[index]);
            toggle.textContent = `üé® ${backgroundNames[index]}`;
            currentIndex = index;
        } else {
            // Default background (no class)
            toggle.textContent = "üé® ËÉåÊôØ";
            currentIndex = -1;
        }
        
        localStorage.setItem(backgroundKey, String(currentIndex));
    };
    
    const savedBackground = parseInt(localStorage.getItem(backgroundKey) || "-1");
    applyBackground(savedBackground);
    
    toggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
        const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % (backgrounds.length + 1);
        if (nextIndex === backgrounds.length) {
            // Cycle back to default (no background)
            applyBackground(-1);
        } else {
            applyBackground(nextIndex);
        }
    });
}

}

// Smooth scrolling for navigation links
function initializeSmoothScrolling(): void {
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href')!);
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
}

// Photo Modal functionality
let currentPhotoIndex: number = 0;
let currentPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}> = [];

function initializePhotoModal(): void {
    const modal = select<HTMLDivElement>("#photo-modal");
    const modalImage = select<HTMLImageElement>("#modal-image");
    const modalInfo = select<HTMLDivElement>("#modal-info");
    const modalClose = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-close");
    const modalPrev = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-prev");
    const modalNext = select<HTMLButtonElement>("#modal-next");
    
    // Close modal
    modalClose.addEventListener("click", closeModal);
    modal.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });
    
    // Navigation
    modalPrev.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(-1));
    modalNext.addEventListener("click", () => navigatePhoto(1));
    
    // Keyboard navigation
    document.addEventListener("keydown", (e) => {
        if (!modal.classList.contains("show")) return;
        
        switch(e.key) {
            case "Escape":
                closeModal();
                break;
            case "ArrowLeft":
                navigatePhoto(-1);
                break;
            case "ArrowRight":
                navigatePhoto(1);
                break;
        }
    });
    
    function closeModal(): void {
        modal.classList.remove("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "";
    }
    
    function navigatePhoto(direction: number): void {
        currentPhotoIndex += direction;
        
        if (currentPhotoIndex < 0) {
            currentPhotoIndex = currentPhotos.length - 1;
        } else if (currentPhotoIndex >= currentPhotos.length) {
            currentPhotoIndex = 0;
        }
        
        showPhoto(currentPhotos[currentPhotoIndex]);
    }
    
    function showPhoto(photoData: {src: string, alt: string, category: string}): void {
        modalImage.src = photoData.src;
        modalImage.alt = photoData.alt;
        modalInfo.textContent = photoData.category;
        modal.classList.add("show");
        document.body.style.overflow = "hidden";
    }
    
    // Make functions globally accessible
    (window as any).openPhotoModal = (photoSrc: string, category: string, allPhotos: Array<{src: string, alt: string, category: string}>) => {
        currentPhotos = allPhotos;
        currentPhotoIndex = allPhotos.findIndex(photo => photo.src === photoSrc);
        showPhoto({ src: photoSrc, alt: category, category: category });
    };
}

// Initialize everything when DOM is loaded
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    initializeCV();
    initializeSmoothScrolling();
});

// Export for potential module usage
export { cvData, initializeCV };

// Main Application
function initializeCV(): void {
    // Set current year
    const yearEl = select<HTMLSpanElement>("#year");
    yearEl.textContent = formatYear(new Date());

    // Populate personal information
    populatePersonalInfo();
    
    // Populate sections
    populateExperience();
    populateEducation();
    populateProjects();
    populateDiverseCases();
    populateSkills();
    populateLanguages();
    populateCertifications();
    populateInterests();
    populatePhotoGalleries();
    
    // Initialize interactions
    initializeLanguageToggle();
    initializeBackgroundToggle();
    initializeThemeToggle();
    initializeContactForm();
    initializePhotoModal();
}

function populatePersonalInfo(): void {
    const { personal } = cvData;
    
    // Update header information
    const nameEl = select<HTMLElement>("#name");
    if (!nameEl.textContent?.trim()) nameEl.textContent = personal.name;

    const emailEl = select<HTMLElement>("#email");
    if (!emailEl.textContent?.trim()) emailEl.textContent = personal.email;

    const phoneEl = select<HTMLElement>("#phone");
    if (!phoneEl.textContent?.trim()) phoneEl.textContent = personal.phone;

    const locationEl = select<HTMLElement>("#location");
    if (!locationEl.textContent?.trim()) locationEl.textContent = personal.location;

    const linkedinEl = select<HTMLAnchorElement>("#linkedin");
    const href = linkedinEl.getAttribute("href") || "";
    const isHttp = /^https?:\/\//i.test(href);
    if (!isHttp) {
        linkedinEl.href = personal.linkedin;
    }

    // Set profile photo
    const profilePhotoEl = select<HTMLImageElement>("#profile-photo");
    if (personal.profilePhoto) {
        profilePhotoEl.src = personal.profilePhoto;
        
        // Add click event for profile photo
        profilePhotoEl.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const profilePhotoData = [{
                src: personal.profilePhoto,
                alt: personal.name,
                category: "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá"
            }];
            (window as any).openPhotoModal(personal.profilePhoto, "ÂÄã‰∫∫ÁÖßÁâá", profilePhotoData);
        });
    }
}

function populateExperience(): void {
    const container = select<HTMLElement>("#experience-list");
    const fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    
    cvData.experience.forEach(exp => {
        const item = document.createElement("div");
        item.className = "timeline-item";
        
        item.innerHTML = `
            <h3>${exp.title}</h3>
            <div class="company">${exp.company}</div>
            <div class="period">${exp.period}</div>
            <div class="description">${exp.description}</div>
            ${exp.achievements ? `
                <ul style="margin-top: 10px; padding-left: 20px;">
                    ${exp.achievements.map(achievement => `<li>${achievement}</li>`).join('')}
                </ul>
            ` : ''}
        `;
        
        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
    
    container.appendChild(fragment);
}

function populateEducation(): void {
    const container = select<HTMLElement>("#education-list");

    cvData.education.forEach(edu => {

        item.className = "timeline-item";

            <div class="period">${edu.period}${edu.gpa ? ` | GPA: ${edu.gpa}` : ''}</div>

        fragment.appendChild(item);
    });
